A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall great fun and enjoyable to watch\, albeit quite sad.   The changing of the old guard to the new is never going to be fully enjoyable\, watching heroes grow old and die is never fun\, and is a problem most reboots face.   I really disliked the way parts of the plot were irrelevant to the broader storyline\, there was some element of pointlessness to it.   But the way the force was explored and the emotional direction of the movie were really well done.  The balance between good and evil and light and dark were covered well.  Looking forward to seeing how the next movie wraps up some of the storylines.
